Question
========
  
The distribution of scores is shown in a histogram. 

![](uu-distributions-002-en-graph.png)

The distribution is...

Answerlist
----------
* symmetrical.
* positively skewed.
* negatively skewed.
* bimodal.

Solution
========
  

Answerlist
----------
* The distribution is not symmetrical. 
* This answer is correct.
* This answer is incorrect. The distribution is skewed, but in what direction is the skewness?
* This answer is incorrect.
